CourseRequest.description: Tired of one-size-fits-all learning? Proleven puts you in control. Request the course you want, then customize it to fit your specific goals. Choose the topics you need to focus on, select the time and place where you want to conduct the course and pick the learning format that works best for you.  This way, you get a personalized learning experience that effectively bridges the gap between your current knowledge and your desired skillset.
